115112.content: Although it was a few days since Kris and Libby's parents brought the dummy Slappy at a old pawn shop both girls disliked him from the start as they stared at him "Look at him he's really ugly isn't he? Even for a dummy." Libby stated looking into the doll's creepy evil smile Kris shrugged "Yeah but there's nothing to terrified of he's only a wooden dummy what harm could he do? Let's keep him in the attic next to Mr. Wood if you don't like him in here." "Fine as long as he's far away from me as possible!" Libby said as she picked up the doll carrying him into the crammed upstairs attic where dozens of old stuff they didn't use anymore including the other dummy Mr. Wood was stored Libby tossed Slappy into a nearby dusty old chair with a disgusted look she cried "There now at least I won't be able to look at your ugly face anymore!" As soon as she left back downstairs the other dummy Mr. Wood turned to the new doll and opened his mouth "Hey you..." He called from hanging on a high shelf Slappy glanced around wondering who spoke then he saw the figure "What do you want?" "I noticed that you're new around here bud and sheesh three days of having you around and already they toss you away in the attic Kris and Libby must really be getting old to bother with us anymore what's your name pal?" The dummy wondering whether to trust this guy spoke softly "Slappy and yours?" The other dummy cracked a sinister smile "Mr. Wood Kris named me after well what I'm made of she used to use me a lot for her hobbies you know the kid was a pretty talented ventriloquist for a while at least until she and her sister got into makeup and boys and all that other stuff then they threw me up here and I have been rotting away to nothing ever since look at these deep cuts into my bark that stupid cat of theirs have been using me as a scratching post and then these darn mice chewing up my clothes all the time it's not fair I tell you!" Slappy already sick of this place nodded his head quickly agreeing everything this guy said so far "Tell me about it that girl Libby did you hear what she called me? Plain and simple ugly do I look ugly to you? If I had my way both of those brats would get what they deserve." Mr. Wood managed to climb off of the high shelf to his location "I hear you bud so how about we give those kids a taste of their own medicine? Eh see how they like being lifeless wooden puppets for a few days or weeks." This was actually better than Slappy hoped he was just mainly used to harmless pranks and mischief this was raising the stakes a bit but what the heck he needed a good laugh so he stretched out his hand "Fine by me Mr. Wood I'm in!" "Cool but how can we turn a couple of humans into stuffed dummies?" Slappy grinned menacingly "Leave that to me by this time tomorrow both of those mean little girls will be doing stand up routines at their school on puppet strings and both of us will be free to do as we please." Both shook hands and waited for the perfect moment to strike
115112.title: Libby and Kris are turned into actual puppet du...

choices: No back to the drawing board
1151122.content: Both dummies took their precious time waiting for Kris and Libby to come back up to the attic hoping maybe they forgotten something or else needed to take something back downstairs but neither girl appeared and Slappy wasn't one for his patients "Man how long does it take for two kids to come back up to the attic? Don't they realize eventually we'll both turn to sawdust in ten years or so....I wonder why they even bothered to buy us if they weren't going to do....." Mr. Wood shrugged "I told you pal those girls don't care about a couple of dummies like us! A log would make a better pet I told you simply waiting for them isn't going to work we got to stoop down to their level if you know what I mean." As he hopped off of his stool and beckoned to Slappy to follow him "Come on if our prey aren't going to come to us then we'll go straight to them I know the way to their room they share bunk beds so it should be no trouble....." As quietly both crept down from the dusty and dingy attic down into the second floor they made very little noise tiptoeing as quietly as possible that even the family dog didn't stir when they crept by his basket finally they made it to their quarry's room and each dummy took a girl Slappy climbed to the top bunk while Mr. Wood stayed at the bottom "Okay this is it you mean little brats its time you learn what happens when you abuse and abandon your belongings....." Then he turned to the dummy dressed in the tuxedo at the top at Kris' bunk "So what do we do?" Slappy's jaw dropped open in disgust as he stared at his fellow wooden accomplice "What? You mean to tell me you don't have a plan.....I thought you said....' "Oh I was merely paraphrasing buddy.....To tell the truth I never did anything like this before I just needed a partner in crime so to speak you didn't think I was going to try and get revenge on these two girls on my own did you?" Slappy fumed knowing he had been stood up but luckily he himself learned a thing or two while stuck at that old pawn shop so he climbed down to the bottom bunk shoving Mr. Wood out of the way "For the love of....no matter I got the perfect plan though this wooden worm filled head does happen to know a few magic spells okay repeat after me Mr. Wood:Karru Marri Odonna Loma Molonu Karrano....." But the other dummy was hesitate at first "Those are some strange words you just said pal you know they kind of remind me of this horror movie I saw this criminal used magic words to transfer his essences into that of a toy doll and......" "Just say the chant already and hurry before they wake up!" Slappy cried out pointing at the snoring Libby it looked like she was about to turn over in her sleep "Okay,okay...." Mr. Wood said shaking his head bitterly "But I still think my plan was better." "You didn't have one remember now hurry up you're wasting time and more importantly dawn's approaching and this spell requires the victims to be asleep or unconscious for it to work properly." As the other dummy slowly recited the words with the other girl Kris at the top bunk Slappy did the same with Libby at the bottom bunk then both stared eagerly at their prey hoping the ritual worked that they would be transferred into their bodies or else be able to mentally control them question is did it even work at all?
1151122.title: They sneak out of the attic to find their prey

choices: Kris woke up and screamed at the sight of both of them
Libby kicked him sending him across the floor
The parents appear out of a sudden in the room
11511222.content:
Both dummies waited for a hour,then two hours passed and still no transferring of them into their human hosts and as expected Wood grew impatient "Hey what gives-why aren't we inside Kris and Libby controlling them from the inside out?" Slappy thought for a moment

"Hmm well this is incredibly strange....the spell should have worked..unless-" He trailed off

Unless? Unless what-what did we do wrong?" The other dummy cried outloud

Shhhhh keep your voice down will ya? They'll hear us!" Slappy whispered with a finger to his lips but Slappy cried out

"So? Let them that is the whole point isn't it? Anyway why do you supposed it failed? I mean we did everything right didn't we?" Slappy scratching his chin thought

"Hmmm you know what I just remembered something-I believe in order for the spell to work one of them has to be awake and we must mentally possess them and then will them to....." But Wood highly frustrated cried out as he did Kris grunted and shifted in her sleep both dummies held their breath thinking she was about to wake up but she soon went back to sleep

"What? You mean we got to wake up one of the brats just to actually attempt to possess them? Give me a break will ya?" He uttered a foulswear word Wood didn't catch

"You got something better in mind? I'm all ears otherwise shut your trap and wake one of them up so we can finish off the transfer spell and it's so long old rotten wooden bodies,hello warm flesh and blood human bodies!"

"Well when you put it that way-okay but which one?" Wood asked

"Does it matter? They're both spoiled brats! Just choose one and hurry up already I can't stand this stupid wooden body for one more-" Slappy said but before his partner in crime could continue with the ritual........

11533331331.title: GB-59

115333313313.content:
Here you were first day at a new school named Josh Wade you had brown hair and blue eyes was short and thin but was a really good baseball player in the summer of this year(1997 to be exact)your parents and you moved to this quite town only called Bell Valley to get away from the hustle and bustle that was the big city of New York but already you were disliking it not that it was a unfriendly place of the people were mean or anything no everyone was pretty nice though there were strange rumors floating about this town,a urban legend if you would about a group of kids from 1947 vanishing in midair while in school or something but you despite the young age of 12 were a highly smart young man and didn't believe in such nonsense or things that didn't make sense "First day,first day best not be late!" You said dashing out of the car in front of the school where your mom dropped you off

"Have a good first day sweetie!" She called

"No problem mom I'm sure I will!" You called back grabbing your book bag and jacket as you timidly approach leaves covered grounds it was the start of fall and open the double doors to the entrance to see a bunch of other students chatting among each other,hanging about laughing or just goofing "Okay here's the moment of truth." You said to yourself as you timidly approached the closest kid he looked friendly enough "Hey I'm new here my name's Josh Wade want to be my frien...."

"No way you look like a geek get lost!" He said brushing you aside you tried again but either they were too busy chatting up a storm with their friends or just weren't interested in a newbie like you but you had no time to fume or complain just yet as you were handed your daily schedule by the school principal Mrs. Borden,a short friendly woman who didn't have time to chat she dashed in,greeted a few of the students you included,made a quick introduction speech then dashed back out again of the gymnasium "No time to delay. I've got to get to math class." You said to yourself as the bell rung unfortunately this school even for a middle school was huge,very huge and confusing you had to ask several teachers for directions just go find home room but finally you were on your way and practically ran hurriedly to the class and see it was shockingly empty! "Must be early."You said. You set your stuff down on one of the desks and check to make sure you have everything. Pencils, papers, notebook, erasers..... "Ok. I'm set. Now to just wait for the teacher.." You said. When you turn to sit, you couldn't move. You tried to speak, or move but couldn't do either. Then you hear a voice. "Hehehehe. Time to have some fun, little boy. It said." You turned around trying to spot whoever said that but couldn't see a soul Then there is a flash of white light that surrounds you and you pass out.

Once you come to a hour later and open your eyes. "W....what was that all about?" You said wildly looking around but amazingly there was still no one not even the teacher in the class room except you yourself strange were you in the wrong room? But that disembodied voice and whatever made that weird light what the heck was that? You had no clue but found you could speak, and move again. And quickly grabbed your stuff to get out of that creepy class room as it turned out you were in the wrong room,your home room was just across the hall but upon reaching to grab your backpack you realized something was horribly wrong! My body froze. And my mouth felt like it was sewed shut "Hey why is my book bag so big,why is the desk so big,why is....Ohh OH NO I-I SHRUNK!" You cried indeed you were incredibly tiny about the size and height of a tea cup. You had no idea on earth how this could have happened though that eerie voice and mysterious light provided at least two clues(It did say "Let's have a big of fun with you" you thought thinking back) but now that you were certain you were micro sized your book bag and jacket were far too big to be of any use to you at least your regular clothes shrank with you otherwise this would be highly embrassing now in fact practically everything towered over you like you had just stepped into Jack and the Beanstalk so quickly abandoning your school supplies you ran into the now enormous and empty hallway "Everyone else either must be in class by now or still waiting to receive their schedule." You thought checking your watch it read 7:45 school technically didn't start for another ten more minutes but it was getting some help that was going to be the hard thing especially at a mere two inches tall.

As you were trying to make sense of things, and slowly moved across the floor the ground started to shake. BOOOOM,BOOOM,BOOM "What the?! An earthquake!?" You whimpered as you were knocked off balance falling onto your back It seemed to get more and more violent and closer. "Feels like the ground is going to open up! "You said trying to get back up then staring up and up and up you see the source of the violent shaking. A tall,young blonde haired girl about your age very pretty with blue eyes and really red lipstick not to mention wearing a thick layer of makeup is slowly coming down the hallway "H...Holy....! She's so huge!" You said agasped both at the fact that she was near Godzilla sized and she was even with all that makeup on was incredibly pretty! You see her open a small pinkish makeup kit with a portable mirror attached and apply more lipstick wearing a long blue sparkling dress just past her knees as you could see her long legs with old fashioned black and white saddle shoes just one simple stomp from them and you were road kill! But at the same time you felt your heart sank all the way to your feet. "Ok. Don't panic..... Panicking won't solve anything. I need to think clearly and form a plan." You said. She did look familiar you recognized her from the gymnasium as she was seemily sitting with two other boys her age one a black haired sort of chubby kid and the other a blonde boy who could just as well be her twin brother you thought you heard some of the other kids teasing of making fun of her for wearing all that makeup and lipstick but couldn't recall what they said her name was,some kind of Mexican name or something but anyway you still look at the giant girl still applying lipstick. "Hmmm whoever she is she certainly looks friendly maybe she can help me..Er excuse me Miss....Whoa!" You said as unable to move you remain frozen in fear "My God...... The closer I get, the bigger she seems to get." You said. As she's still applying lipstick? "How much does one girl need on their lips?" You muttered to yourself You see that you barely come up to her shoes. When she shuffled her feet, you gulp at the loud sound of them hitting the ground hard. To whoever or whatever is listening above..... "Please don't let me be between her shoes and the ground." You pray silently

"I think that's enough for now." She said to herself even her voice is pretty angelic as she carefully closes her makeup kit,capped up her lipstick tube and placed it back into the little black purse she was carrying over her right bare shoulder and heads straight in your direction her every step causing your entire world to shake and you fought for balance.

"I need to get her attention before I'm squashed but how?" You said starting to panic again
115333313313.title: A shrinking day

1153333133131.content:
With each thundering stomp, she was getting closer and closer. You had already moved out the way of her saddle shoes. As big and wide as they are, anything under them would automatically become a blood stain. "She's coming my way. Maybe if I shout up at her, she'll hear me." You said. Competing with her booming footsteps, you scream up at her. "HEY! MISS! DOWN HERE ON THE GROUND" You shouted. It seems to have worked. She stops dead in her tracks right in front of you.

"...Is someone here?" She asked pausing briefly her voice sounds like that of an angel, making you feel like you could trust her. She starts looking around for the source of the voice.

"DOWN HERE! BY YOUR FEET!" You said. Listening to the voice, she looks down at the ground. You stare up into her big, blue eyes as she looks down at you. "Please don't see me as an bug, please don't see me as a bug." You repeated to yourself She blinks a few times and gasps clutching a hand to her mouth.

"Ohhhh A.....Are you real person?" She asked bending downwards slowly to examine you.

"YES!" You shouted. She reaches down for you and gently picks you up each finger seemed like a giant redwood tree making you sweat a little. Her fingers wrap gently around you.

"I'm going to lift you up okay?" She said in a soothing manner. You are lifted off the ground and up to her face to look at you up close you see just how pretty the girl really is. "Wh-what are you-this can't be for...but y-you-you are real aren't you? You're a human right?" She said utterly surprised as you

"Yes....Yes I'm human just tiny but at this rate like I'm going to church if I get back to normal" You mutter.

The girl didn't respond to this she began walking you had no idea where she was going to class maybe? But no instead she walked all the way down to the first floor to the now huge empty gym and sat down on a pair of bleachers studying you carefully then asked "How' did ....you get so small?" She asked

"I....don't know here I was getting ready for class, then there was flash of white light, and here i am incredibly tiny like this!" You said truthfully You hold your head downward. This catches her attention and makes her worried and she frowns heavily you are scared of her for this reason the fact she or anyone else could just as easily crush you like a grape with one simple squeeze

"Ar....Are you scared of me?" She said concerned.

"Of you, no but the situation I’m in and your shoes, yes." You said.

"My shoes? Why are you scared of them?" She asked curiously gently setting you on the nearest set of bleachers you began shivering as the metal bleachers were so darn cold you were practically breathing frost but answered her question truthfully

"They were the first thing my eyes laid on. Combined with the thundering echoing and big they are,not to mention it felt like being in a earthquake I didn't want to be near them." You said. Given your current size, she could understand why anyone at that terrified size could be just as easily stomped on by a shoe,slipper or boot though she had other things to be concerned with right now she had something new to worry about with you expressing your fear, she didn’t want that to happen to you. She brings one of her fingers to you and rubs your head in a gentle way. You look up at her smiling face.

"Don’t worry. I’ll keep you far away from my big, bad saddles then!" She said jokingly tenderly picking you up again By comforting you, she hoped you would feel comfortable around her.

"Th….thanks.” You said feeling a tad better.

"And I’ll help you get back to normal. I promise anyway I can.” She said giving you a sweet smile.

"I wasn’t expecting you to be so friendly. Are you always like this?” You said starting to feel comfortable around this girl.

“Yes mostly unless you do something to upset me of course like steal my lipstick or makeup but I don’t see any reason why you would being you're really small*giggle* but if you want me to be mean….hehehe I'm just kidding.” She with a grin.

“No, no! I prefer friendly!” You said quickly. You look up at her angelic face. “For someone who puts on a lot of makeup, she really is very pretty.” You think

"What's your name?" She asked

"Josh. Josh Wade. And your name?” You asked

"Thalia Halpert-Rodis don't worry Josh. We’ll fix this now is there anything you remember before you got this way? You said something about...a bright light?" She asked thinking hard.

"There was some kind of voice that said "Time for some fun little man!" But when I looked around there was nobody there at all! You confessed

"Are you sure that's what the voice said? Are you certain you heard a voice at all?" Thalia asked bringing you closer to her titanic face

"Yeah 100% I happen to have really good hearing Thalia but I wonder what a voice and a bright light has to do with me shrinking? And who was it who do it? This town's pretty freaky did you hear rumors about a bunch of children disappearing in 1947-" you started but she a bit angry cut you off

"Yeah I've heard everyone knows about that! But anyway what you were saying about hearing the voice tell me what did it sound like?" She asked

"Like a guy's voice,he was cackling!"

"Cackling?" She arched a eyebrow

"Yeah you know laughing like mad! Saying It's time for a bit of fun then the bright light flashed before me and that's all I remember then I woke up two inches tall y-you believe me right? You don't think I'm making this up?"

"Well I'm sitting right here beside you looking at you at two inches tall so why would I think you'd be making this up Josh?" Thalia put a finger on her chin "Until we can figure out how to get you back to normal you had better stay around me for a while I don't want anyone else to try and step on you or worse you have no reason to be afraid of me I won't hurt you alright?" She asked

"Okay. You said

"So did you just move here to Bell Valley?" She asked

"Yeah a few days ago." You replied nodding

"You're not the only person to move to Bell Valley a boy named Tommy recently just moved here three days ago but all current circumstances aside I hope you like it here." Thalia said

"Yeah I think I've seen him sitting with you in the gym this morning and that other boy is he your brother? I mean you look a lot alike." You ask

"Who oh you mean Ben,Ben Jackson the boy with the same blond hair and blue eyes I have? No we're not brother and sister we're not related at all. He just happens to look like me that's all." She explained

Just as you two were getting acquainted, the bell rings. “That’s the first-class bell. I need to put you somewhere.” She said getting up and began walking again this time to a completely filled classroom on the first floor with th two other boys you saw her with your first day here the black haired sort of chubby boy named Tommy Frazer and the other boy who closely resembled Thalia herself named Ben Jackson,a jokester apparently as he kept on cracking lame jokes and another girl a heavy set really tall,muscular girl with white-blond hair,grey eyes and dressed in sheet black clothes Thalia told you was Greta not a nice person "I ran into her before and she're really odd!" She warned you beforehand and sat down at a desk in the front row Thalia opens up her purse and gently puts you in. "I know it’s a little cramp with all my makeup, lipstick and belongings but once class is over, I’ll find a better place for you you just stay still until then alright I'll check up on you in a bit." She said as she zips it close as the rest of the students and the teacher Mr. Devine comes in.
1153333133131.title: Found

choices: You fall out from where you are
11533331331311.content:
You found a open spot between her mirror and lipstick to sit. "There's a lot of makeup in here. Eye liner, shade, gloss, lipstick. Every kind of makeup you can think of." You noticed as you looked up at the towering metal lipstick. "Why is this so special to her?" You said. There was nothing for you to do except wait until class was over. You sit there quietly and wait until you hear the bell ring. Thalia puts her bag across her arm and walks out of the class. “Where is she headed?” You asked. Thalia walked for a few minutes to the gym. She sits down on one of the cold bleachers and opens her bag. "Are you okay in there?” She asked as you saw nothing but her enormous face you shrank back a bit in fear but nodded

"Yeah. Where are we?” You asked. As she began walking at before stopping and you see...

I need to pick one for the dance which is in a few days." She said. Thalia browses around and picks a few dresses including a red one,a green one and a blue one and heads to the changing room. She opens her purse and takes you out. “Josh. I need your take on a dress that will look good on me for the dance.” She said smiling down at you

"Do you have a particular one in mind? What about that black one over there?" You said pointing to it "It's cheap." But she frowned

"No I picked a few out with actual colors but I need your opinion on them.” She said as she set you down on the chair and walks to the dressing room. “Josh. Can I trust you not to peek on me?” She said calmly

"You have my word.” You said. Thalia headed into the changing room and comes out in a red dress with back straps. “Well?” She said beaming "What do you think?"

"If it had some sparkles or something to make it shine, it would be perfect for you.” You said. Thalia looks in the mirror and nods in agreement.

"Hmmmm you're right. It has no shine to it. On to the next one.” She said. Thalia walks back into the changing room and after a few minutes, comes out in a white dress with some rhinestones on the chest. “How about this one? It's a bit expensive." She said.

"But can you afford it? It looks like it costs a fortune!" You pointed out

"I actually have plenty of money to pay for it." She replied

"Dang then your parents must be loaded to be able to let you have that type of dress!" You cry out

"Shhhhhh someone might hear you! And I'm not rich I just happen to come from middle class anyway what do you think Josh?"

"Well it matches the color of the decorations, but won’t other people be wearing white as well?” You asked She thought about this

“You’re right. I’ll just blend in. I want to stand out.” She said. Thalia goes in and comes out in the green dress which looked plain compared to the rest

"Okay how do I look in this one?” She asked

Looking at her in that dress, your heart skipped a beat. “D…don’t just gawk at me like that. How do I look?” She said in a huffily voice

"P….perfect. You’ll stand out at the dance in green definitely.” You said.

"Are-are you sure Josh? Because it looks a little too plain to me! How about the last one?" As she pulled out the sparkling blue one you nodded

"Looks great,better than the previous one!"

"Okay I'll wear it then!" Thalia takes off the green dress and puts her old clothes back on putting all the other dresses back on the rack before picking out the blue one and proceeds to the checkout. Thalia pays for her dress and heads out.

“I hope I'm going to look stunning at the dance.” She said once she got back outside it was a cloudless,blue sky and pretty day today.

“More stunning than you know? Is that possible?” You joked

"Ohhh quit it. You’re making me blush!” She said

"That's the point. You’re really cute when you blush.” You can't help but say out loud Saying that, Thalia's face got redder as she snapped out of it when her stomach growls to you it sounds like a roaring titanic monster or animal of some kind

"Whoa someone's not happy with you! Did you eat?” You asked

“Uh…. No. Come to think of it. I didn’t eat at all yesterday.” She said "I was too occupied with other things........" She muttered under her breath

"So that’s how you stay thin. You starve yourself.” You joke but the giant girl covered in makeup frowned even more

"I….don’t starve myself!” She pouted.

"So that’s how you fit into those dresses. You know that’s not healthy.” You said, chuckling. Thalia was a little annoyed at you poking fun at her, but she had an idea as a small smile played upon her pretty face

"You know you're right. I should eat. And I know the perfect thing.” She whispered

“Well, pick where. We’re at the food court.” You pointed out as she left the clothes store and headed into one of the fast-food joints

"Ohhh I already have my meal or at least am about to......." She said with a michievous face.

"Where at?” You said. You notice Thalia is looking at you with a hunger. “Thalia…..” You started

"What? I need to eat. Listen.” She said. Thalia holds you against her stomach and it rumbles loudly a bit louder than ever

"I need food now. And you’re the closest thing.......” She said you tried to back up but where could you go? As it was a a hundred foot drop to the ground if you fell off her hand

"You’d….eat your boyfriend?” You choke out

"If I do, you’ll become a part of me. We’ll never be separated.” She said.

“Thalia….. If you’re joking with me….” You said trying to convince her otherwise but she looked dead serious

“I’m not. It’ll be quick.” She said as she slowly brought you to her open mouth.

"THALIA!!" You cried out When you got closer, Thalia closed her mouth and puckered up her too red lips. You felt being pressed up against something soft and warm. You open one eye to see nothing but a wall of red. You’ve seen this shade of red before. It’s Thalia’s lipstick color. “Mwah!” She said, breaking the kiss.

“Thaila….. W…..were you teasing me?” You asked fearing settling in every part of your body

"Maybe! But one good tease deserves another. You know I would never eat you.” She giggled cutely

"But….. You sounded so serious about it.” You shiverimg like crazy but she calmed you down

"Sorry about that but I had to make you believe me. Did I scare you that bad?” She asked sounding sorrowful

"A little…..” You muttered Thalia kisses you again. “

"I'm very sorry so about now?” She said.

"I’m good.” You said quickly. Thalia headed to an ice cream parlor and gets bowl of vanilla with chocolate syrup on top. Thalia takes a seat and gives you a few small pieces. When she finishes, Thalia puts you in her old purse and heads back to the school with her new dress.

When Thalia gets back to the teacher’s lounge, she puts her dress on the table. “I can’t wait for the dance! I have a dress and a little boyfriend!” She teased

"You’re….not going to show me off, are you?” You said.

"No. It’s already bad enough Greta knows. I don’t want the whole school to know.” She said. You shiver when she mentioned Greta. “I don’t want to know about you or discover your tiny state!"

"But a lot of other girls might discover of my existence and you know how wily eleven and twelve year old girls can be about tiny doll-men!" You pointed out

"Ohh but they won't discover you Josh not as long as you're with me little cutie!" Thalia cooed

"Gee Thanks…..” You said. Thalia sits on the couch and gently rubs you. Then she gives you a few more kisses. “You plan on kissing me all day?” You said, smiling.

"You’re too cute not to kiss!” She cooed bringing you even closer.

"As much as I love the compliment, I don’t want to be the color of your lipstick.” You said.

"Then what do you suggest?” She said. “How about…..

115333313313112122221112121.content:
“We could past the time by playing a game.” You said. thinking quickly a game might be fun.

“What do you have in mind?” She said thinking along those same lines as it might take her mind off a few other things......

“How about hide and seek?” You said at first you may have thought this as a bit too childish after all it was something 6 and 7 years olds would play but she seemed pretty interested

“Ok. I’ll go first. I’ll count to thirty. That should be enough time.” She said as the giant girl put you on the ground softly and closes her eyes. One....two...three......."

When she starts counting, you look for a hiding spot. (She won’t find me under the couch.) You thought. You head under the couch just as she counts to thirty. "Okay ready or not here I come!” She said as her footsteps begin shaking the ground she looked inside the closet first. “Hm. I thought for sure he’d be here.” She said. Thalia heads over to the water cooler and looks behind it. “Not here either.” She said. Thalia’s bare feet stop right in front of the couch. “Where’d he go? I thought this would be easy at first….” She said.

"It’s easy for me.” You said under your breath.

"Wait. He could be under the couch.” She said "Josh you can't keep hiding forever you know!" Thalia said a bit playfully

" Ahhhhh crud she's smarter than she appears.” You thought as she got on her knees and you see her blue eyes looking in scanning the entire area you remain completely still, hoping her gaze would overlook you.

Thalia gets up and you breath a sigh of relief."Ohhhh where could he be? Did he leave?” She said a bit annoyed you laugh a little as she racks her brain. Thalia looks for a few more minutes until she calls it quits. “Ok. I give up, Josh. Where are you?” She said. You come out from under the couch. Thalia sees you come out and picks you up. “I looked under there, and didn’t see you!" She said in surprise.

"I stood still and carefully held my breath.” You said grinning

"No way! I want another try at this. That was cheating!” She said with her hands on her hips

"I’m game for a rematch.” You said as you smiled back Thalia puts you on the ground and starts counting. You know the first place she will look is under the couch. And she’s going to re check all the other spots you can get in.

"Nine.....ten....eleven...."

Then your eyes came to her massive red slippers. “She’s getting close to thirty. Beggars can’t be choosers.” You thought panicking a bit then you begun climbing the enormous soles.

As you get to her slippers and climb in them just as she hits thirty. “This time I’ll find you.” She said with a prideful smirk just as you predicted, Thalia looked under the couch first and feels around under there. “Thought he’d be there again.” She said frowning a bit

"I think not I play to win, Thalia.” You said. As she was looking around, you notice that her slipper didn’t reek of sweat. “For as much as she walked today, not a hint or drop of sweat in here.” You said. Thalia continues to search, but comes up empty.

"Where is he?” She said. Thalia looks around until her eyes fall onto her slippers. “He isn’t…..I mean it would be really weird and even he's not that.......ohhhhh.......” She muttered as she felt something moving around and Thalia smiling to herself put her foot inside the slipper you’re in.

When you saw Thalia’s foot coming in the slipper, you ran to the toe section. Thalia wiggled her toes around to feel for you. “A rock and a hard place here.” You said.

"Hehehe I know you're down there Josh! I can feel you...and tehehehe you're tickling my foot stop it!" She giggled but you touched her big toe and her other toes stop moving and her foot is taken out. The slipper is then picked up and turned upside down. You fall out onto her hands. “Really, Josh? You were hiding in my slippers?” She said with a broad grin on her face

"I knew you would look under the couch first, and I was running out of time. Your slippers were the closest thing.” You said.

"What if I’d put them on? You’d be trapped in there. Do you know what too much pressure will do to you?” She said as she brought you to her face still smiling

"You have sensitive feet. I’m sure you were bound to feel me if I was trapped in there.” You said.

"I think we should stop before you make my ribs sore from laughing too hard!” She said as she had a serious fit of the giggles then took a seat on the couch.

"So we should play something else?” You said.

"Yeah. And I know just what.” She said. Thalia brings you to her ruby red lips and start kissing you. “It’s called the kissing game!” She said. You were constantly bulldozed by Thalia’s too massive lips, but you weren’t complaining. With each kiss, some of her lipstick got on you. “Well? *mwahhhhhhhhhh* How do you like this game? *Mwwwwwwwaaaaaaaaahhhhhhh*” She said.

"I’m not complaining.” You said although you were being smothered by her massive juicy too red lips causing her to aimlessly giggle

"Heh heh! I can't help it......You *mwah*........ are....... *mwah*..... so.......... *mwah*...... cute! *mwah*.........” She said. Thalia kept barraging you with kisses for a few more minutes before she stopped.

“Did you have fun?” She said, smiling.

"A lot more than what I suggested.” You said.

"As much as I want to keep doing this, it’s nighttime.” She said looking up at the clock which read 7:58PM

"I know the drill….” You said. As Thalia puts you down, you turn your back as she changes. As Thalia changes into her PJ’s, you wanted to take just a quick glance, but remembering the mirror that caught you last time. “If I’m really quick, maybe she won’t notice.” You said. Moving your head a little, you see Thalia just removing her light blue shorts and only in her underwear busy shaking out her blond hair, her long,slender legs, her round rear end that you vividly remember being trapped against and her extremely pretty angelic face

“She is so beautiful.” You said. As you were gazing at her, you notice at the last second that Thalia was looking at you through the mirror. “Oh uh!" You mutter. You waited for Thalia to turn around and berate you, but she doesn’t. Instead, you see her bashfully smiling. “I…is she smiling?” You said. Thalia walks over to you now in her green PJ’s.

"Josh…..” She said as she slowly got up frowning at you

"I’m sorry! I couldn’t help myself! You’re just…..so pretty.” You said unable to stop yourself at this remark Thalia blushes heavily, even though her face was now grey, you could tell.

"I had a feeling you would do this again.” She said sighing

"I promise I won’t do it again.” You said feeling ashamed at what you just saw and said

"To tell you the truth, I’m not mad as I was when you did it the first time.” She said.

"You’re….not?” You said amazed

"No. Since you been using my trust well, I think…..you can….look every now and then.” She said.

"Wait!? Are you serious!?” You said.

"Y….yeah. I trust you enough to give you some leeway. Just don’t overdo it.” She said smiling mischievously at you.

"I won’t. You’re my girlfriend, not a piece of meat.” You said.

Thalia lays down and places her hand over you. “I trust you know what’s not allowed while I sleep.” She said.

"I know. I’ll be right here when you wake up.” You said.

"If you aren’t, you’re going to ride in my shoes all day.” She said forcing a loud yawn from her mouth

"Slippers or saddlers?” You said.

"Saddlers.” She whispers.

"I’ll be right here.” You said quickly. Thalia giggles at your reaction and kiss you. “I’m teasing, Josh. Calm down.” She said. Thalia pulls you closer to her. The sound of her gentle heartbeat eases your nerves and lulls you to sleep. “Goodnight, Josh.” She said before closing her eyes.

With the sun shining right down on you, you woke up quickly noticing Thalia was holding you close to her and she was smiling. “She’s an angel!” You couldn't help but think outloud The light snoring coming from her was cute. “Thalia. Wake up.” You said. She stirs, but doesn’t wake up. “Thalia. The dance is today.” You said. Her eyes open, but only a little. "Yeah but It’s….not until tonight." She muttered as she rubbed her eyes and sat up blinking

"I don’t want you to oversleep and forget.” You said.

"I’ll be up and…..ready by then until then I need a little more sleep Josh.......” She said, closing her eyes again as she went back to sleep. You couldn’t escape her iron grip, so you had to wait until she woke up again Which wasn’t for another two hours.

As you're trying to go back to sleep yourself you are startled awake when you heard a low rumble. “What the?” You said terrified then you hear the rumbling again, and it wakes up the giant girl holding you closely “What’s that…..sound?” She said, half asleep. Thalia hears the rumbling coming from her stomach as she sits up. “I hear you. Give me a minute.” She said. Thalia rubs her eyes and yawns. “Josh….? Where are you?” She said, not seeing you in her hand.

Er your other hand.” You inform her as Thalia brings her hand up and opens it. “You slept like a rock.” You joked but she doesn't reply to this

"What time is it?” She asked

"Fifteen minutes to ten.” You said.

"Good. The mall should be open when I get there. Do some last minute shopping and eat. Unless…..you want to volunteer. She said. Thalia opens her mouth wide and you back up. “I….I’m good.” You said. Thalia giggles and puts on her clothes which was her usual navy blue shorts and short sleeved shirt which tiny red dots on it with a red bow on the top and her pink hair bow and make up and heads to the mall. “What do you need this time?” You asked curiously

"Just some jewelry. Nothing fancy. Just a necklace or a bracelet.” She replied as Thalia heads into the jewelry store and starts browsing. “Ohhhh. This necklace with the heart is gorgeous!” She said. Thalia tries it on and nods with approval. She pays for the necklace and heads to the food court. Thalia heads to the food court and gets and ice cone. She eats and finishes it as exits the mall.

Thalia heads back to the teacher’s lounge and takes you out of her purse. “Got what you need?” You said.

"Yeah. I’m all set.” She said. Thalia starts doing her hair and makeup so that all she has to do later is just put on her sparkling green dress.


When night came, the school dance was packed with the students wearing black and white. When Thalia walked through the gym door, all eyes were on her and her green dress. As she made her way through the crowd, she was getting compliments left and right. “Wow. Didn’t think I’d be popular.” She mutters. Thalia makes her way to the food table and opens her purse. “You doing ok in there?” She asked glancing down at you

"Yeah. Seems like you caught the all the guys attention.” You said.

"think it’s because of this dress. Although, I do enjoy the heads I’m turning. Even Ben did a double take.” She said noticing her double twin staring jaw dropped Thalia drops some pieces of food in for you. “There. I’ll put some more in later.” She said. Thalia zipped her bag closed and heads to the dance floor. Greta and her band was performing, and even though Thalia and her are at odds, Greta was good at performing.

Thalia was enjoying herself at the dance. Chatting with friends, drinking, enjoying the music, and everything else. Thalia made her way to the bathroom and took you out. “Enjoying yourself out there?” You said. “I am, but I wish I could dance with you. That’d be the cherry on top of this dance.” She said. “You’d save the last dance for me?” You said. “Definitely.” She said. “Well don’t let me keep you from the fun.” She said. Thalia gives you a quick kiss before putting you back in just as someone comes in.

“Thalia. Not putting on your lipstick.” A voice said. Thalia tunes to see Greta blocking standing in the doorway. “Oh. Greta. Aren’t you and your band suppose to be playing?” Thalia said. “On break. Can’t perform on empty.” She said. “And you’re here why?” She said. “You know why?” Greta said. “Can’t you just leave him alone. He wants nothing to do with you.” Thalia said. “And let you have all the fun? I know you used him as a servant at least once. What’d you make him do?” Greta said. “That’s none of your concern. Now get out the way.” Thalia said. “Sorry princess. But we’re settling this.” Greta said, pushing Thalia back in. “Greta…. I’m sure we can talk this out like rational people.” Thalia said. “Rational, huh? And what do you have in mind?” Greta said. Thalia pulls you out and you see Greta. “Uh…. H…hi, Greta….” You said nervous. “Yeah. Nice to see you too, shrimp. Hurry it up. I’m back on in 10.” Greta said. “Josh….. I know you won’t like this. But Greta won’t stop coming. I need you to agree to what I’m about to say.” Thalia said. “And what is that?” You said. “We share him. I get him for half the week, you get the other.” Thalia said. “L…like I’m some kind of toy?!” You said. “Toy? I like the idea.” Greta said with a mischievous smile. “He’s not a toy! Josh…. I know how you feel, but think this through for a second.” Thalia said.

(“Thalia is right. Greta’s persistent. She won’t stop anytime soon. If this gets her off my back, I’ll put up with it.”) You thought. “Ok. I’ll do this.” You said. “Shrimp’s on board with the idea. Now who get’s him first?” Greta said. “Josh will decide.” Thalia said. You wanted to stay with Thalia. Who knows what Greta has planned for you. But it would be better to go ahead with Greta and get all the torture and pain out the way now. “Hurry up, shrimp.” Greta said. “Don’t rush him! Take all the time you need, Josh.” Thalia said comforting.

“Ok. I’ll go with……

“I want a footrub.” She said taking off her heavy shoe it nearly came close to hitting you!

"What you expect me to do that at this size?” You said defying the giantess

“I’m expecting a lot of things from you. You’re going to do this. Or else......" She said as she slammed her fist into the ground again but you called her bluff

“Or what? You’ll kill me? Do it.” You said boldly "You won't be able to do it...."

"Oh no. I won’t kill you. I wouldn’t be able to keep my promise to the Lipstick Girl... No, shrimp. I’ll make you suffer. And you know making people suffer is what bullies do do best not that I what you'd call a bully I just don't like people who think they're better than everyone else and little twerps like you and that new kid Tommy what's-his-name who knocked me over that one day!" She said. She has a point. She took Thalia's lipstick probably as a game or prank but the blond girl took it more seriously more than to publicly humiliate her but who knew what kind of crazy plans this girl had for you? “So I’ll say it again. You will either do this or POW!!" She said as she punched the wall her gist made a deep imprint and crack in the wall you shivered and moaned
"A….Alright. I’ll….do it.” You said defeated knowing you had little choice in the matter what was to stop her from crushing you totally?

"I knew you’d see things my way.” She said as Greta sits on her bed and plucks you roughly up with one hand "You better put me on cloud 9.” She said as she drops you right in front of her feet. You stare up at them and shiver. “Holy cow! What size shoe does she wear? Her feet are massive! You said a bit amazed.

"I’m waiting!” She said impatient. Not wanting to anger her anymore, you start to rub her feet as best you can. Greta could feel your tiny hands moving on her feet and smiled. “That’s right. You should get know them. They’ll be the last thing you see if the pretty little princess thinks to come for you which is highly unlikely!" She said smirking and laughing

"“Thalia….” You muttered sadly For 20 minutes, you rub her feet until she tells you to stop.

“See? Was that so hard to do?” She said.

"You’re not the one who’s exhausted.” You mutter.

"You forgot to kiss them.” She said stretching out her massive feet each toe was the size of a car compared to you! You were at first going to say something, but stop yourself. Swallowing your pride, you pucker up and kiss both of her feet. “Aw! Thanks for the love, shrimp!” She said. You spit to get the salty taste out of your mouth. “If you behave more, you’ll find your life to be easier. You might even forget all about Miss Makeup!” She said.

"If Thalia does keep her promise…. I hope she does it very slow.” You mutter to yourself. Then there was a knock at the door. “Ah! That must be them my buddies coming over for band practice!” Greta said as she got up. “Don’t even try to escape. I’ll find you.” She said before leaving Greta had left her door open. You wanted to run, but remember what she said she’d do to you. You wait a few minutes until she comes back. “Good. You didn’t run. Maybe I won’t show you to my bandmates and just play with you myself.” She said. She picks you and brings you over to her dresser and drops you in with her shirts. “Be glad I didn’t put you in my shoe.” She said before closing it. You were in complete darkness. You couldn’t even see your hands. All you do is just sit there and wait. You could hear the loud rock music that was being played by Greta’s band. As the loud music was playing, you count the minutes until it stopped. After some minutes pass, you hear footsteps and the dresser opens up. Greta grabs you and hold you in front of her.

“Y….you done already?” You said.

"Yeah, and we played great. But I want to show you something.” She said. She puts you on the floor and lifts her barefoot over you. What you saw made your stomach twisted. A mangled and flatten small insect. “That’s right. Get a good, lasting look, shrimp. That could be you.” She said. Greta stomps down in front of you and twist her foot. “It only lasted for two seconds.” You won’t be that lucky. So you better pray Thalia forgets about you!” She said. Greta was going to pick you up, but there was a knock at her door. “Ugh. Who could that be now?” She said. Greta left to go see who it was and left you there. You nearly hurl at seeing the sight of that mangled insect. “H….How can….someone be so cruel?” You said. You heard footsteps coming. You wanted to run and hide under the bed, but are still in shock. What shocks you more is seeing who’s booming footsteps they were. “T….Thalia!” You said.

"Josh…. Where are you?” She asked appearing out of nowhere whispering "I secretly followed her to her house! Where are you...."

" DOWN HERE! LOOK DOWN! You shout. Thalia looking like she was worried sick suddenly looks down to see a small figure. “Josh!” She said. Before Thalia could get you, Greta comes back and sees her. “Hey! She said. Greta tackles Thalia and the two start fighting. To avoid being crush by the two of them, you duck under Greta’s bed and watch. Thalia lands a few good hits, but Greta returns the favor. “You got a lot of nerves coming here.” Greta said. “I’ll make you pay for taking him!” Thalia said. The two girls start hitting each other as you watch. “Please win, Thalia.” You said.

"Are you okay Josh?" Thalia asked studying you carefully studying you

"Yeah now I am thank you for everything you did Thalia you befriended and took care of me when no one else would." You said

"So now that you're normal sized again and school's apparently out what did you want to do now?" She asked powdering her face as usual you stole a look at her makeup kit over her shoulder it looked really low so you brought it to her attention

Despite her trusting you completely other than Tommy and Ben Thalia ultimately decided to keep it secret for now so instead she changed the subject

"Hey what are you doing tomorrow?" She asked suddenly

"Tomorrow?" You repeated stunned "I was still on today!"

"Today's almost over with remember? Anyway we don't have to decorate the gym tomorrow after school so I was wondering if you'd like to do something with me tomorrow you know like what's the word-hang out and go a few places!" Thalia said as she finished up putting her makeup back into her purse turning back to you smiling

"I'll tell you later Josh! Anyway did you want to go out with me?" She asked "For the day that is-I'm just kidding if you want to go on a date with me so ahead and ask me!" You were flabbergasted you have never been asked out much less talked to such a pretty girl

"Aren't you going to answer me Josh?" Thalia asked bringing herself closer to you and pretending to bat her pretty eyelashes,her very breath smelled exactly like cinnamon and her ultra cherry lips were entirety kissable maybe later on she would let you...... But you shoved those thoughts aside

"Yes! I mean yes I will! After all a very pretty,nice girl like you probably has a lot of ideas to what we can do tomorrow,I'm still fairly new to Bell Valley and don't know my way around." You exclaim trying to keep your voice utterly calm but she nodded equally excitedly

"I actually do! Hmmmmmm how about you meet me......"
1153333133131121222212222.title: Keeps it secret for now.

11533331331311212222122222.content:
“Meet me tomorrow at the pool slide.” Thalia said now putting on thick makeup that was waterproof

"A day of fun in the sun at the pool?” You asked

“What better way?” She said smiling sunnily at you to which you replied

“All right, I see you there.” You said as you and her parted ways.

When you got home, your mother hugs you tightly. “Josh! Thank goodness you’re ok.” She said in a panic but you were bewildered

“What’s wrong, mom?” You asked

"You didn’t come home. Do you have any idea how worried I was about you!? Where were you!?” She scolded but you already had a excuse ready

"I stayed with a friend. It was sort of a last second.” You said. You sweated a little hoping your mom would buy your lie.

"sigh* Okay but could you at least tell me next time? I couldn’t eat or sleep because I was worried sick about you.” She said.

"Well I see it didn’t stop you from making the house spotless.” You said glancing around the house as your father was enjoying the Monday Night Football game in the Family Room your mother shrugged

"I’m a stress cleaner. Sue me.” She said. After a deep breath and sigh of relief, you took a bath and headed to bed.

When morning came, you were expecting to see Thalia’s grey face. “Where’s Thali-Oh. I’m not small anymore.” You remembered realizing how happy you were,extremely happy that you’re back to normal size, but you do sort of miss being with her a little. You get up to wash up and upon finishing and telling your parents you're headed to the pool slide at the only other city park you grab your swimming trunks and head to the pool and see Thalia standing there amid dozens of other kids and teens You were going to say hi, but stop when you see her in a striped green and black swim suit.

Looking at her like that. plus with all that make up on that was apparently water proof made you lose all knowledge of speaking. “Josh. Josh!” Thalia said as she beamed at you

"Huh? Thalia?” You said.

"Were you expecting anyone else? I said hi and you froze up.” She joked "Tommy and Ben said they were going to be here but I haven't seen them around so for now I guess it's just you and me."

“Well….. I wasn’t expecting a swimsuit model.” You said.

"S….s….Swimsuit model!?” Thalia said with a red face looking down at herself "Oh this....the main store was all out of the regular one piece bathing suits so I picked out this."

"Anything else would have been an insult.” You said. Thalia didn’t know how to respond. Beautiful and pretty were one thing, but being compared to a swimsuit model, now she was the one lost for words. “Thalia? Thalia!" You said.

"Huh? She said.

"Now you’re the one who spaced out.” You said.

"O…Oh. Sorry. Well aren't you going to change into your swimming trunks or are you planning to be wearing your regular clothes in the water?" She said. You both looked away from each other.

The feeling was there, but neither of you knew how to express it. “I’m…..going to go change.” You said breaking contact at last.

"Okay I’ll…wait for you.” She replied as you ran into the bathroom and change into your swimming clothes. After finishing, you look in the mirror and took a deep breath. “Calm down, Josh. It’s just Thaila. She’s just like any other girl. Oh who am I kidding? No she’s not. She’s 20x better than any girl.” You said. You throw some water on your face. “I need to know. I have to ask her.” You said. You head out of the bathroom.

“You took your time in there. Is there something wrong?" Thalia asked with concern.

"Y….yeah. So you want to just jump in or go down the slide?” You said.

“Let’s jump in!" She said as she started to head to the closet one but you stopped her

"Wait. I just thought of something. Won’t your make up run? And dry up?" You quizzed her but she shook her head

“No it's waterproof I can stay for as long underwater as I want. Now come on.” She said, jumping into the water. You followed in after her.

"I take it you’ve done this before?” You asked as you noticed how good she was

“Maybe a few times.” She replied doing a quick lap

"So you’re a fish?” You joked

“Ha,Ha see for yourself.” She said as she started swimming from one end of the pool to the other. She was surprisingly fast, and at the same time graceful. Watching her doing this a few times before stopping. “Well?” She said upon stopping

"Wow. I think you broke the world record of fastest swimmer.” You said. Now it’s your turn.” She pointed out and beamed at you and you were desperate to impress her

"Okay prepare to be astonished.” You boasted as you start swimming from one side to the other. You’re weren’t as fast as her but you didn’t let her out do you. “How was that?” You asked

"You know what you’re doing, at least.” She said

"It seems like I need a teacher then. Preferably blonde. And a former giant.” You said.

"Ohh really?" She giggled as you and her climbed out of the water and sit on the edge. With her close to you, your heart was beating fast.

“She’s right there. Just ask her. But what if she says no? What then? No one else compares to her.” You thought. While deciding, not noticing the slight smile on her face Thalia comes over to you and sits in your lap with her arms around you. “T….Thalia!? You said beyond amazed

"Yes Josh?" She said beaming innocently.

"W….what are you doing?” You said.

"Well someone had to make the first move. And you were taking your time, so I thought I’d do it.” She said her face barely a inch from your own

"F….first move?” You said stunned Thalia moves her head ever closer, her lips to your ear.

"I know you like me.” She whispered

"W….what?! W….where did you get that from?" You said. Thalia gives you a small kiss on the check. You start blushing when she breaks it.

"Say it for me.” She whispered in your ear in a flirting way.

"I….like you.” You said.

"Keep going.” She said as her red ruby lipped smile got wider.

"W….what?” You said. Thalia started to kiss you again, but a little closer to your lips and stopped

“I want you to say: I like you and want you as my girlfriend.” She said firmly

“G….girlfriend?!” You choked out

"Don’t play dumb. I knew it since yesterday. And today when you called me a very pretty and kind girl and spaced out.” She pointed out.

"Y…you also spaced out.” You said.

"I wasn’t expecting swimsuit model. Now are you going to say those words, or do I have to find a way to shrink you back down to make you say them?” She said a bit sternly With a flushed face, and no other choice you say what she wants to hear.

"I…..like you. A…..and want you as my….” You said.

"Say it for me, Josh.” Thalia said liking the direct amount of control she currently had over you though she knew deep down it wasn't right.


"G….girlfriend.” You said. Thalia then kisses you fully on the lips. After a few seconds, she breaks it.

"Now, if only there was a way to shrink you down.” She teases.

"W….would you really shrink me down if you could?” You asked curiously

"Maybe every now and then. And I'd keep you in my saddles!" She said.

“Great….. Like shrinking me down wasn't bad enough. I'd be roommates with your toes” You said annoyed but she lets out another cute giggle

"I’m just teasing. I wouldn't keep you in my shoes silly that would be very wrong!" She said.

"I thought you were too soft hearted to crush insects on purpose. It had to be an accident." You said. as she got off of you and you couldn't help but notice despite her really thin figure and being in the sixth grade(most of the kids here were also in the 6th grade)she had really long,sexy legs and a sizable rear end then she then kissed you once more and whispered "You'd be safe in my purse." She said.

"At least I'm safe." You said. Thalia continues the kiss for a few more seconds, then breaks it luckily there was no one else in this section of the pool.

“So where to now? It’s starting to get crowded here.” You said but she suggested

"Well then let's go to......"
11533331331311212222122222.title: At the pool slide at the park? And wear your sw...

115333313313112122221222221.content:
“To the ice cream shop.” She said grinning.
"What better time?” You replied smiling back.

Arm and arm together, you and Thalia dressed in a open shirt with tiny red polkadots and blue shorts along with red shoes with her normal blonde curly hair done in a ponytail with a small red bow head to the ice cream shop.

When you both get there, you were amazed that there was hardly anyone else no other kids there at all as Thalia heads to the display. “Ohhhh! Mint! Chocolate! Vanilla! Strawberry! Which one do I get first?!” She said incredibly excitedly and licking her red cherry lips as you look at the poster.
"All you can eat contest?” You said. "Look!"
"Yeah. Winner gets free ice cream for life. Kids have been pouring in here since 7 this morning and many turned out a little worse for the wear! Claiming they'll never eat another thing of ice cream for as long as they live!" The shop keeper said from behind the counter shaking his head
"For life? Really? I'm in how about you Thalia how much ice cream can you eat?" You asked
"This is an all you can eat contest? Well I guess I can eat quite a bit! I might have a little trouble fitting in to my clothes but okay." She says as she also studies the notice board
"Yeah! Where do I sign!?” You said happily
“Right here.” The shop keeper said. Thalia quickly signed her name and took her seat in an occupied booth as did you.
"All right. One rule. The bowls have to be completely empty.” The shop keeper said as he brought a bowl for both Thalia and her opponent. “For an extra bonus, contestants can try to be the record of ice cream bowls eaten. Record is 21. Now are you both ready?” He said holding up a small flag
"Ready!” Thalia and you said union

"Okay then Go!” He said bringing the flag down.

Not wasting any time, Thalia and youquickly eat the first bowl of ice cream. And quickly, the next bowl is given. Then the next. And the next, and the next, until you unable to eat another scoop from your vanilla filled bowl clutched your stomach and got up mostly your head was aching from brain freeze. “First round goes to this young lady!” The shop keeper said gesturing to Thalia despite her petite appearance the part of her face that wasn't covered in makeup was covered in specks of multi-colored ice cream she was quite the eater the crowd(and there were very few in the crowd) as Thalia comes to you with a big smile while wiping her mouth off with a napkin “I did it Josh! I’m advancing to the next round!” She said.
"Yeah….” You said.

As the contest goes on, Thalia advances further and further in until she gets to the finals. (“All those bowls of ice cream and not a single sign of brain freeze.” Losing color is one thing, but I’m wondering if Thalia is even human.) You thought. You watch the contest and Thalia wins. “Ladies and gentlemen, we have a winner!” The shop keeper said, raising Thalia's arm in victory. “Yes!" Thalia cries happily in triumph.

The shop keeper then takes Thalia's picture, frames it, and labels it “Winner of the ice cream contest." “Now, is the anyone from the crowd who challenges the now...Er you don't mind if I call you the Ice Cream Queen do you?" He asked

"Not at all." She replied smiling you steal a glance at her midsection she's strangely still incredibly thin

"Alright then anyone want to challenge her for the top title? Any takers?" No one from the crowd steps up, except you. “Ladies and gents, we have a challenger!” He said. You and take a seat in the both.
"Really, Josh? You’re going to do this again? I thought you said you were full?" Thalia said a little smug.

"I'm willing to try it another try.” You said. Then the shop keeper brings you both bowls of ice cream.
"Same rule as the contest. Bowls must be completely empty. Ready?” He said.
"Ready!” You both said. “Go!” He said. You and Thalia quickly eat multiple bowls of ice cream. The contest was neck and neck and neither you nor Thalia showed signs of giving up. That was until you notice you both were nearing the shop record of the most bowls eaten.

“Ladies and gentlemen, both contestants are nearing the house record. But there can only be one winner! He said.
"Quit while you’re ahead, Josh. I’m not losing to you.” Thalia said still strangely thin her face partially covered in a mixture of makeup and ice cream
"Not a chance.” You said. You both keep going until you both pass the record.
"I don’t believe it! The record has been broken! But like I said, there can only be one winner, who will it be?!” The shop keeper said. (Thalia’s taking this super serious. She really wants to win this. Heh.) You thought.

On the next bowl, you feign brain freeze. “Ladies and gentlemen, we have a winner!” The shop keeper said. While people were cheering for Thalia, you went outside to wait for Thalia. After a few minutes, she walks out with a frowning look.

“Hey! Aren’t you happy about your lifetime of free ice cream?” You said.
"Did you let me win?” She asked
"What do you mean?” You said.
"All those bowl of ice cream and you just happen to suffer a brain freeze at the end? No way. Did you throw the contest just so I can have the record?” She asked.
"No. I seriously have brain freeze.” You said, hoping she’d believe you.
"And I have serious....uh oh.........." She moaned clutching her own stomach

"What's wrong are you about to throw up or something?" She shook her head

"No but I feel I'm about to......... *BUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPP!" She let out a loud burp luckily there was no one around to hear the girl from the Class of 1947's explosive gas from her mouth you were utterly amazed but Thalia on the other hand was beyond embarrassed as her whole face turned bright red and she clapped a hand over her mouth crying out

"Ohhh Excuse Me!" She blushes even redder her blue eyes dart around to see if anyone is nearby fortunately there is no one for miles
"Better out than in!" You joked outloud as she throws you a disgusted look
"That was very embarrassing!" She muttered palm facing herself.

"Yeah but anyway I wouldn't lie just because. I'm being serious here." You said changing the subject quickly to cheer her up her embarrassment moment over she looks slightly calmer

"You are?"

On this particular day his father had brought home a old cuckoo clock from a pawn shop down town and while his parents weren't looking Tara herself walked right in and started messing around with it,spinning the hands around,and winding and twisting the mechanical bird which squawked the time every half hour until it nearly broke Michael himself tried stopping her only to receive both a painful stomp on the foot and a solid telling off by his mother when she thought he was annoying her!

"Whoohoo this is fun!!" Tara exclaimed as she kept playing around with the clock little did she know how much this magical piece of time equipment would end up having on her and the world.........

145.content:
Plot: The story takes place in Miami shortly after nerdy college student Larry Chaney Jr. has returned from a vacation to Haiti with his girlfriend Sam. While there, a Voodoo witch cursed him with a kind of symbiotic virus. The virus gives him the ability to grow vicious, hooked tentacles from his body, the ability to change his hands/arms into weapons, the ability to consume/devour other people and unnatural healing abilities and endurance. His hunger growing and growing, he tries to find a way to survive without hurting innocent people, including his friends and family

The Good Guys:

Larry Chaney Jr: Nerdy college student turned borderline monster after a Haitian witch's curse

Sam Adrieux: Marc's girlfriend trying desperately to help find a cure for his symbiotic virus. She fears that after having recently had sex with Marc, their baby could possibly have the symbiotic virus.

Hector Deloise: Larry's best friend, who becomes increasingly doubtful that a cure can be found for the symbiotic virus. Instead, he tries to find evil people for Marc to feed on.

The Bad Guys:

Dr. John Raines: Larry's adopted father. A scientist who wishes to experiment on his own son in order to obtain the symbiotic virus himself.

Geraldine St. John: The Haitian witch who cursed Marc after a heated argument

You may come up with your own characters as well.
145.title: The Corrupter

1451.content:
It has been 800 years since the Agua virus took a human host. Now, as the result of a Haitian witches curse, it shall once again have a host. A battle will rage inside the body of a young man. His very humanity, along with the fate of the world, is at stake;

Larry Chaney woke up slowly on the plane back to the U.S. The sight of his girlfriend's chin resting on his shoulder made him smile a bit. Snuggling with Sam was always the highlight of his day. It was a small relief, but relief nonetheless. He'd been having nightmares all night long about that crazy Haitian woman. Larry always had something of a temper and the way that hag talked to him was enough to make a Saint lose his shit, but he still truly regretted his words. He just didn't talk to women that way. Larry pulled a Spawn graphic novel out of his backpack, it would hold his attention at least for the next hour. Then, something happened.
1451.title: Prologue

choices: Oh God! I'm cursed! What do I do?
Hmmm...This Corrupter stuff may come in handy with bullies.
14511.content:
"I hate airplane food." a gruff, high pitched voice growled. "I hate it. So dry and undercooked and bland." Larry turned to his right to see a horrifying sight. A giant, obese humanoid dog sat next to him. The dog wore a rainbow sweater that must have been 2 sizes too small for him, and thick glasses covering his piercing, frightening red eyes. His hair was long and dirty, making him look even bigger. From his slobbering mouth were long fangs perfectly suited for the kill. If Larry had to put a guess on the breed, he'd say a cocker spaniel. But whatever sat next to him was clearly one of a kind.

"I mean I got no problem eating my own shit, but at least that's juicy!" The humanoid dog laughed hysterically, slapping Larry's back hard. Larry was too terrified to even scream. He got up to try and run away, but found his legs wouldn't work. No matter how hard he fought and pushed, they just wouldn't move. The dog rolled his eyes at Larry's attempts to get away. "Oh, stop being such a pussy. You'll get your chance to leave and run free, I can promise you that. But first I need to talk to ya."

"What the FUCK are you?!" Larry gasped, still struggling. He needed to get out of here. No, he needed to wake up. This was all a nightmare. Some awful nightmare brought on by a combination of that crazy old lady and bad airplane food. The dog scratched the crack of his ass repulsively and then extended his hand to Larry. "Name's The Puppy, servant of Agua. I'm here to help you reach your full potential."

Larry looked at The Puppy's hand with a grossed out expression, shivering in his seat. The Puppy shrugged. "Guess you were able to guess I didn't clean up today! Almost stink palmed ya!" The Puppy laughed hysterically again, so much to the point that he actually started crying. He wiped away his tears before leaning near Larry's face. "Alright, back to business. Do you know what you are?"

Larry looked at The Puppy, both confused and repulsed. "Larry Chaney, 19 year old kid from University of Miami?"

The Puppy growled in frustration, putting on a crooked and forced smile for Larry, like a parent would do for a particularly stupid child. "Let me explain this slowly, so my words can sink into that thick simian skull of yours. YOU are a Corrupter. Ooh, I know "Corrupter" is a big word for ya, but keep listening. Now a Corrupter is a soldier of the Haitian God Agua, and the receiver of his virus. You get enhanced durability, superhuman healing, shapeshifting of your limbs into any weapon you can imagine and the ability to consume anything via your tendril tentacles, summoned at WILL I might like to add! You have unlimited power and NO responsibility. Hell, you actually HAVE a responsibility to have as much fun and devour as many people as possible. Cause once you do, you'll gain the strength to take over this whole rotten planet! Then Agua can ascend, and 1,000 years of darkness will officially begin for all mankind!"

Larry was having a difficult time taking all this in. What was his initial reaction?
14511.title: Larry got a vision.

"Body! Get over here and deal with this girl.", said the Guillotine Girl's head.

Then a body of a girl in a white dress appears with a scythe. Sonia realized who this is and made a run for it. She just ran and used any pots or trays that she can find to defend herself against the body. The Guillotine Girl's head was sadly left behind and looked at the headless body that brought Sonia to her.

"Don't just stand there. Give me to my body.", cried the Guillotine Girl's head.

The body does so and ran towards the chase. Sonia had a small duel with a metal tray that was laying around and manage to hit the body so hard that it gave her time to escape. Sonia then ended up...

14523.content:
This book follows you, the reader, through separate story pathways with several 'good' and 'bad' endings in each. You wake up from a horific dream and find yourself in an old, creepy house. You realize that you have no idea where you are, or who you are. You quickly meet another tall and dark haired boy your age who also suffers from amnesia. You call him Max since he was wearing a shirt that says 'To the Max'.

This will take place after a 'Bad Ending' from two separate story paths:

Story A, you and Max head down stairs after hearing a door being knocked on. When you open the door, two huge men in suits come through and try and take the both of you. However, you and Max somehow manage to fight and knock them out. As you two search for clues about your identify, you discover that you are secret agents involved in the production of a teleportation device called a Matter Slammer. However, those two men are still after you, and their is an enemy agent on the loose who you do not recall their identity...

Story B, You and Max try to sneak to the top of the stairs to see who was at the door. You are confronted by a hunger commanding an army of mysterious doll, all armed with silver weapons. Under this path, you and Max turn into werewolves and either join the other werewolves to fight the hunters, or join the hunters and try to find a cure.
14523.title: All-Day Nightmare - Give Yourself Goosebumps

choices: The first: You are a human/dog/snake hybrid
The second: You and Max are a two-headed secret agent
145231.content:
The two muscular men from before were able to ambush and capture you and Max. You both wake up in completely different place, the secret base of this mysterious organization. The two men are in the room, and one explains that you and Max were the first test subjects of your government's teleportation project, but they had sabotaged the device. The Matter Slammer had transported you and Max to the abandoned, old house without any memories. Additionally without you and Max appearing at the correct location, your government was likely to abandon the project and label it a failure. This would allow this group to have the only working Matter Slammer, if only theirs actually worked. The two men reveal a terrible, mashed-up creature, the result of their Matter Slammer. It was something crossed between a dog and snake. It had the head, legs, and tail of a dog, but its body was long and scaly. One of the men explain that their teleportation device scrambles and mixes whatever is being transported. Their team had been working on a fix to the problem, and they now need to test it. Since you and Max are now MIA, you make the perfect test subjects.

The first bad ending is where you and Max manage to escape right away from the two men. Running down hallways, you find an open room to hide in. After closing and locking the door, you and Max realize that you are where this group's Matter Slammer is located. Unfortunately, there is no other way out and the agents are trying to break in. You Max agree to use the teleporter separately to avoid being mixed-up together. He goes first and successfully disappears. You then activate the machine for yourself, but the process was taking too long. The men manage to break down the door and swarm in side. Wisely, none of them try to approach you for fear of being teleported with you. But the mashed-up dog/snake lunges to attack you just as the Matter Slammer activates. You are suddenly in an open field. Max spots you and runs away in fear. You realize that the dog/snake and been mixed up with you. Fur and scales cover your body, and you have sharp claw-like hands. What do you do now?

The second bad ending stems from where you and Max decide to play along, waiting for a better opportunity to escape. The two men leave you, handcuffed, in the small room. Reasoning that you and Max are secret agents, you try to see if either of you have any special gadgets that can help you escape. Max finds a device hidden in his shoes and pulls it out. The device has two buttons with two tiny labels, 'Para' and 'Emer'. Neither of you have any idea what they mean, but you both decide agree on the 'Para' option. Max pushes it, and a gas spews out that paralyses you both. The men from before return at a later time and find you and Max still paralyzed. They place you both in the Matter Slammer and activate the device. Moments later, you and Max materialize standing in an empty field beside each other, miles away from the enemy agency's base, and the paralysis has worn off too. Unfortunately, you realize that you are not standing beside Max. You and Max are standing in the same spot, with only one body between you. Both of you heads are attached to the same shoulders. What do you do now?

Should this story start from the first or second 'bad ending'?
145231.title: Story A: The Matter Slammer
